Discover Tippooor for Warpcast – Elevate your casting experience on warpcast.com with our elegantly simple Chrome extension. Tippooor is ingeniously designed to automate your tips casts, making every interaction on warpcast.com more efficient.

How It Works:

Instant Setup: Quickly define the tip you wish to automate through an intuitive popup. This initial step is all you need to unlock automated tipping.
Perfect Integration: Tippooor melds flawlessly with the warpcast.com interface. A bespoke button, designed to feel like an inherent part of the site, is added for your convenience, promising an uninterrupted and cohesive user experience.
Casting Made Simple: With your settings in place, initiating your automated cast is as straightforward as clicking the Tippooor button.

Why Tippooor?

- Maximize Your Time: Free yourself from the redundancy of manual inputs. Tippooor streamlines your tipping process, allowing you more time to create and engage.

- Elevate Productivity: Tippooor is your ally in making your presence on warpcast.com as productive as possible. Whether it’s broadcasting updates, sharing insights, or engaging with your audience, do it more efficiently.

- Seamless User Experience: Designed to feel like a natural extension of warpcast.com, Tippooor enhances your workflow without any disruptions. It integrates so smoothly, you’ll wonder how you ever managed without it.

Getting Started is a Breeze:

- Add Tippooor for Warpcast to your Chrome browser.
- Configure your default tip with ease.
- Enjoy the simplicity and efficiency of automated casting.
